word_mean: 云地［间］放电, cloud-to-ground discharge  云和地面之间发生的闪电放电现象。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 要掌握云平台，首先要对这里“平台“的含义达成共识。一种普遍的想法，是将平台看成“任何为开发者创建应用提供服务的软件“。下一节，我们将对此作具体讲解。应用平台的一般模型我们今天对应用平台（application platform）的认识，主要来源于户内平台（on-premises platforms）。因此，一种思考云平台（cloud platforms）的方式，就是考察应用开发者在户内环境里所依赖的服务（services）是如何转变为“云（cloud）“的。
云端(Cloud)是基于应用虚拟化技术的集软件...更多>> 推荐使用好压软件，解压缩更快。
叫克劳德（CLOUD），FF7的人气王，长的是满帅，不过我还是最爱卡丹裘（KADAJ）J赞同0|评论登录忘记密码? 不错~~不是真人C…
云字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 云鬓〖 lady'sbeautifulhair〗 云彩〖 clouds〗 云层〖 cloudlayer〗.

list.abs: 标签云（tag cloud）（Tag Cloud）是用以表示一个网站中的内容标签。标签的排列顺序一般依照字典排序，按照热门程度确定字体的大小和颜色。
译者注：云端伺服器（ Cloud Server ）本身是虚拟主机的意思。「3年后的NB就会和现在完全不一样，未来每台相机也都能直接连网 …
常用物理英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... electron beam 电子束 electron cloud 电子云 electron microscope 电子显微镜.
云安全（cloud security）(Cloud Security)是一个从“云计算”演变而来的新名词。云安全（cloud security）的策略构想是：使用者越多，每个使用者就越安全，因为如此庞大 …

phrase.cizu_name: every cloud has a silver lining

lj.lj_ly: he left under something of a cloud, accused of misappropriating funds.
lj.lj_ls: 他走了，遭到几分怀疑，被指盗用基金。

phrase.cizu_name: with one's head in the clouds

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a person) out of touch with reality; daydreaming

jx.jx_cn_mean: 空想的：想象的；不真实的；爱空想的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English clūd 'mass of rock or earth'; probably related to clot. Sense 1 dates from Middle English

entry.def: A cloud is a mass of water vapour that floats in the sky. Clouds are usually white or grey in colour.

example.ex: The sky was almost entirely obscured by cloud.
example.tran: 天空几乎完全被云所遮蔽。

entry.def: A cloud of something such as smoke or dust is a mass of it floating in the air.

example.ex: The hens darted away on all sides, raising a cloud of dust.
example.tran: 一群母鸡四处乱窜，搅起一团尘土。

entry.tran: 把…搞糊涂;使难以理解；使无法正确判断
entry.def: If you say that something clouds your view of a situation, you mean that it makes you unable to understand the situation or judge it properly.

example.ex: Perhaps anger had clouded his vision, perhaps his judgment had been faulty...
example.tran: 可能是愤怒蒙蔽了他的眼睛，也可能是他判断有误。

example.ex: In his latter years religious mania clouded his mind.
example.tran: 晚年的时候，对宗教的狂热让他丧失心智。

entry.def: If you say that something clouds a situation, you mean that it makes it unpleasant.

example.ex: The atmosphere has already been clouded by the BJP's anger at the media.
example.tran: 印度人民党怒斥媒体，已经破坏了气氛。

entry.tran: (眼神或脸色)阴沉，忧郁；使看起来阴沉（或忧郁）
entry.def: If your eyes or face cloud or if sadness or anger clouds them, your eyes or your face suddenly show sadness or anger.

example.ex: As he looked at Katherine, great sorrow clouded his eyes.
example.tran: 他看着凯瑟琳，满眼忧伤。

entry.def: If glass clouds or if moisture clouds it, tiny drops of water cover the glass, making it difficult to see through.

example.ex: The mirror clouded beside her cheek...
example.tran: 她面颊边的镜子变得模糊不清。

example.ex: I run the water very hot, clouding the mirror.
example.tran: 我把水开得很热，水汽模糊了镜面。

entry.def: If you say that someone has their head in the clouds, you are criticizing them because they are ignoring or are unaware of the problems associated with a situation.
If you say that someone is on cloud nine, you are emphasizing that they are very happy.

example.ex: When Michael was born I was on cloud nine.
example.tran: 迈克尔出生的时候，我都乐得找不着北了。

entry.def: If someone is under a cloud, people have a poor opinion of them because of something they have done.

example.ex: The military are under a cloud for killing civilians while breaking up a demonstration.
example.tran: 军方因在平息示威活动时杀死了无辜平民而备受指责。

means.word_mean: 1. any collection of particles (e.g., smoke or dust) or gases that is visible
2. a visible mass of water or ice particles suspended at a considerable altitude
4. a cause of worry or gloom or trouble;

sentences.sentence: "the only cloud on the horizon was the possibility of dissent by the French"
"after that mistake he was under a cloud"
"a swarm of insects obscured the light"
"The stars are obscured by the clouds"

means.word_mean: 3. billow up in the form of a cloud;
5. place under suspicion or cast doubt upon;
6. colour with streaks or blotches of different shades

sentences.sentence: "The chemical clouded the liquid to which it was added"

list.explanation: 失宠的，受怀疑的，名誉扫地的

example.en: He has been somewhat under a cloud since they found the corpse in his closet.
example.zh: 自从他们在他的壁橱里找到那具尸体之后，他就一直受到怀疑。

Sentence.sentence: Here's where things get interesting, though: If a particularly important passage is highlighted by multiple Inkling users, that information is stored on the cloud and is available for anyone reading the same textbook to come across.
It's not like just sitting down somewhere and watching the clouds roll by.

sentences.en: There are so many clouds today.

means.word_mean: 云状物（如尘雾、烟雾、一群飞行的昆虫）

sentences.en: The mosquitoes were coming in clouds.
sentences.cn: 蚊子一大群一大群地飞来。

means.word_mean: (使)某物变得阴沉暗淡, 不清楚
显得阴沉（或恐惧、愤怒等）；看起来忧愁（或害怕、愤怒等）

sentences.cn: 他的脸突然变得阴沉下来。

jushi.english: These high summits are seldom free from clouds.
jushi.chinese: 这些高山顶上难得没有云在那里。

jushi.english: The sky is covered with dark clouds.
When they married, there were no clouds on their happiness.
jushi.chinese: 他们结婚时并不存在影响他们幸福的因素。
